topics.body:
I remember Me and my brother were like having contests to see which one had the rarist Gotcha Borgs.

Also if you had two memory cards with different data you could TRADE Gotcha Borgs with your friends.

And me and my brother And even my sister would sometimes Trade Borgs for ones we liked or if we had two of the same one's.

The game really brings back a lot of good memories.
